footer.mission: We work to spread the Salafi methodology across Malawi through educational and social programs that strengthen creed and support the community.

hero.title: A beacon reviving Qur'an and Sunnah in Malawi
hero.description: We are an independent civil foundation dedicated to calling to Allah, spreading authentic creed, reviving the Sunnah, combating innovation, and educating communities in Malawi upon the methodology of the pious predecessors, with a constant vision to establish schools and Islamic institutes.
hero.welcomeBody: Great to see you again. Explore our latest programs and events.

about.title: Insightful dawah and structured work to serve the community
about.description: Ahlul Athar Dawah & Guidance Foundation in Malawi teaches people the fundamentals of their faith, strengthens their bond with sound creed, and implements awareness and social programs that preserve Muslim identity, uphold their rights, and spread virtue in society.
about.visionDescription: We aim to establish a network of Quranic schools and Islamic institutes that graduate students firmly grounded in Tawhid and Sunnah, capable of leading their communities with truth and justice.

values.title: Salafi Methodology
values.description: We adhere to the Qur'an and Sunnah upon the understanding of the righteous predecessors, focusing on instilling the sound creed in people's hearts.

values.title: Education
values.description: We believe that Islamic knowledge is the foundation for building a Muslim individual empowered to serve their community.

values.title: Institutional Work
values.description: An independent civil organization with legal personality, operating with clear plans to serve the community and support educational and social programs.

services.title: We accompany you on a journey of faith and giving
services.description: We offer programs that combine educational dawah and community awareness, guiding people back to the Salafi path and charting for them a course of steadfastness and balance.

items.title: Qur'an and Sunnah Education
items.description: Regular scholarly circles that deepen the understanding of Allah's Book and the Sunnah of His Messenger.

items.title: Islamic Lectures
items.description: Weekly lectures delivered by scholars and preachers to strengthen faith and refine morals.

items.title: Children's Programs
items.description: Educational and recreational activities that help children build their Islamic identity in a safe environment.

items.title: Women's Services
items.description: Knowledge gatherings, support meetings, and tailored programs addressing the needs of women in the community.

items.title: New Muslim Support
items.description: Personal mentoring, foundational lessons, and introductory circles to ease the integration of new Muslims.

items.title: Youth Empowerment
items.description: Guidance and mentoring for youth to face challenges, providing safe spaces for dialogue and growth.

impact.title: Ongoing dawah and educational programs across Malawi
impact.description: We reach villages and neighborhoods, revive mosques, organize lectures, sponsor Quran circles, and support those in need so the pure creed remains a shining light for the people of Malawi.
impact.ctaTitle: Join us in spreading the authentic methodology in Malawi
impact.ctaDescription: We invite you to support our dawah and educational projects and to back the efforts that restore clarity of creed and help families remain steadfast upon the true religion.

updates.title: Keeping our community informed

contact.title: Join us in creating positive impact
contact.description: Be part of our vision to instill the Salafi creed in Muslims' hearts and help establish schools and institutes that protect our children from deviation and innovation.

donate.title: Help us expand our dawah and educational reach
donate.description: Every contribution enables us to hold study circles, support Quran school students, and carry the message to new villages across Malawi.
